NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: The projection pool has been installed, Oeno! Now, we will be able to travel to this site easily for further inspections.
2
1
CYCAD: This space seems rather small, Coleus.. Will there be enough space for the warp receiver into the <color=orange>Sanctuary?</color>
3 2
OENO: That won't be a problem, Cycad! The space has everything it needs already.
4 3
CYCAD: But.. A warp transmitter requires a connected warp receiver to function, does it not?
5 3
OENO: We won't be constructing a warp receiver to enter this structure, Cycad! It would be too costly. We plan on entering using different means.
6
5
COLEUS: Cycad, have you heard of Daz's latest invention? It will provide us with the most convenient entry into the <color=orange>Sanctuary!</color>
7
6
COLEUS: In fact, Daz has asked all of us to use his invention during the <color=orange>Sanctuary's</color> construction.. We will be the first to test it thoroughly!
8
7
OENO: I cannot wait! Cycad, you must visit the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> to learn more about Daz's invention when you can!
Campsite EX3 8
Campsite EX4 4
SY R4 8
Workshop R1 8
